snippet: Rafael Nadal will play Kei Nishikori in the Barcelona Open final after both past champions won their semifinals in straight sets on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal will play Kei Nishikori in the Barcelona Open final after both past champions won their semifinals in straight sets on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal to Face Nishikori in Barcelona Open Final
headline.main: Nadal to Face Nishikori in Barcelona Open Final
